overview: Tamara is a magnificent forty something bourgeoise and today was supposed to be one of the best days of her life. Her beloved son, Anthony, is just about to get married. But there is a big problem. His bride to be, Cara, is a pure bitch. Didn't she sleep with her ex the day before her wedding? Didn't she give herself to three of the guests, minutes before the ceremony? Who would want such a daughter in law? But Tamara herself is far from being the white dove she pretends to be. She's just about to play some very perverse games with Cara's own father. After all, these two women might just get along with each other.
tagline: Cara is slutter than her mother-in-law!
title: My Daughter in Law Is a Whore
